data_table.description: Genetics of Bone Structural Geometry, Original Cohort Exams 22, 24

variable.name: Scan_Side
variable.description: HIP SIDE (RIGHT VS. LEFT) THAT WAS SCANNED

variable.name: problem_code
variable.description: INDICATES IF ERROR PREVENTED ANALYSIS AT ONE OR MORE REGIONS

variable.name: NSA
variable.description: NECK SHAFT ANGLE. ANGLE BETWEEN THE NECK AND SHAFT AXIS (DEGREES).

variable.name: NeckLength
variable.description: NECK LENGTH. MEASURED FROM THE CENTER OF THE FEMORAL HEAD TO THE INTERSECT OF THE NECK AND SHAFT AXIS (CM).

variable.name: NN_BMD
variable.description: NARROW NECK BONE MINERAL DENSITY (G/CM2). BONE MINERAL IN THE PROJECTION OF THE CROSS SECTION MEASURED AS THE AVERAGE OF 5 LINES OF PIXELS TRAVERSING THE NARROWEST NECK REGION.

variable.name: NN_CSA
variable.description: NARROW NECK CROSS SECTIONAL AREA (CM2). TOTAL BONE SURFACE AREA EXCLUDING SOFT TISSUE AREA AND TRABECULAE.

variable.name: NN_CSMI
variable.description: NARROW NECK CROSS SECTIONAL MOMENT OF INERTIA (CM4). FOR BENDING IN THE IMAGE PLANE FROM THE BONE MASS PROFILE INTEGRAL.

variable.name: NN_Width
variable.description: NARROW NECK WIDTH (CM). WIDTH OF THE NARROWEST PART OF THE NECK.

variable.name: NN_Sect_Mod
variable.description: NARROW NECK SECTION MODULUS (CM3). A MEASUREMENT OF BENDING STRENGTH THAT DEPENDS ON THE DISTRIBUTION OF AREA IN THE CROSS SECTION AND INCREASES AS THE SQUARE OF THE DISTANCE FROM THE CENTER OF MASS.

variable.name: NN_End_Dia
variable.description: NARROW NECK ENDOSTEAL DIAMETER - ESTIMATED (CM). ESTIMATED ENDOSTEAL DIAMETER THAT ASSUMES CORTICES ARE CIRCULAR AND SYMMETRIC WITH OUTER DIAMETERS EQUAL TO THE MEASURED SUBPERIOSTEAL WIDTH.

variable.name: NN_AvgCortex
variable.description: NARROW NECK AVERAGE CORTEX (CM). AVERAGE CORTICAL THICKNESS.

variable.name: NN_AvgBR
variable.description: NARROW NECK AVERAGE BUCKLING RATIO. INDICATOR OF BONE STABILITY IE: ANY VALUE 10 OR ABOVE INDICATES INSTABILITY AND MORE LIKELY TO FRACTURE.

variable.name: IT_CSMI
variable.description: INTERTROCHANTERIC CROSS SECTIONAL MOMENTS OF INERTIA (CM4)

variable.name: S_CSMI
variable.description: SHAFT CROSS SECTIONAL MOMENT OF INERTIA (CM4)
